snippet: Noteworthy names such as Zakary Pelaccio, April Bloomfield and Sean Brock got together for a culinary hoedown in the Hudson Valley that was all about turning up the heat.
lead_paragraph: Noteworthy names such as Zakary Pelaccio, April Bloomfield and Sean Brock got together for a culinary hoedown in the Hudson Valley that was all about turning up the heat.

headline.main: Celebrity Chefs Get a Chance to Play With Fire
